go_data.justification: FcR gamma-chain is associated with a signaling pathway similar to the TCR-signaling cascade in platelets.
FcR gamma is part of the Fc receptor complex, which binds immunoglobulins.
FcR gamma-chain is involved in collagen-induced activation of platelets.
FcR gamma-chain is part of a pathway that links cell activation to the reorganization of the actin cytoskeleton.
